mean_cn: n. 市场；行情；销路；  v. 销售
mean_en: an occasion when people buy and sell goods; the open area or building where they meet to do this; business or trade, or the amount of trade in a particular type of goods; a particular area, country or section of the population that might buy goods
sentence: I usually buy fruits and vegetables at the market.
sentence_trans: 我通常在市场里买水果和蔬菜。
